We are a research group on [TOPIC] at DCC-FCUP. Our aim is to [GOALS]. Our research interests include:

Software verification and theorem proving
Program testing and analysis
Programming languages and type systems
Program logics and semantics

We aim to provide an active and inclusive research environment that includes [ACTIVITIES]. If you are interested in learning more, come to one of our meetings, or get in touch.

title: Research
text: Extented introduction to the group. What are the research objectives of the group. To realize these objectives, our research activity is focused on the following topics:

title: Research
text:
Programming languages and type systems
Gradual types, intersection types, linear types, quantitative types, resource analysis, functional programming, logic programming


Program testing and analysis



Program logics and semantics



Software verification and theorem proving
Automated program testing, property-based testing


Automata theory and formal languages



Security and cryptography
